identification.activateCurrentDeviceDescription: Your pass has already been activated on another device. If you continue, your pass will be automatically deactivated on the other device if it is still active there.
identification.activateDescription: You have already applied for the Nürnberg-Pass and received an activation code? Scan the code here.
identification.applyDescription: You do not yet have a Nürnberg-Pass? Here you can apply for your Nürnberg-Pass.
identification.cardExpired: Your pass has expired. You can apply for renewal under "More actions"
identification.cardInvalid: Your pass is invalid. It has either been revoked or activated on another device.
identification.cardNotYetValid: The validity period of your pass has not yet started.
identification.checkFailed: Your pass could not be verified. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
identification.codeRevoked: This pass could not be activated as it has been revoked.
identification.moreActionsActivateDescription: Your saved passes will be retained. You can remove them manually.
identification.moreActionsActivateLimitDescription: To add another Nürnberg-Pass, you must first delete an existing Nürnberg-Pass.
identification.moreActionsApplyDescription: Your saved passes will be retained.
identification.moreActionsApplyTitle: Apply for or extend a Nürnberg-Pass
identification.moreActionsRemoveDescription: After selection, this Nürnberg-Pass will be deleted from the device.
identification.moreActionsVerifyDescription: Check the validity of a Nürnberg-Pass
identification.removeDescription: If this pass is deleted, it must be added again before using it again.
identification.verifyDescription: You would like to check the validity of a Nürnberg-Pass? Scan the code here.
identification.verifyInfoTitle: How to check the validity of a Nürnberg-Pass

intro.applyDescription: Provide your personal information in the form. The application is then forwarded and processed by the responsible office.
intro.applyTitle: How can I apply for the Nürnberg-Pass?
intro.usageDescription: On the map of Nürnberg you can find all acceptance points. Tap on a location to be able to see more information.
intro.usageTitle: Where can I use my Nürnberg-Pass?
intro.welcomeDescription: Thank you for downloading the app for the Nürnberg-Pass!

deeplinkActivation.headline: Activate pass
deeplinkActivation.description: Do you want to activate this pass?
deeplinkActivation.limitReached: Your pass limit has been reached. Please remove a pass first.
deeplinkActivation.alreadyExists: This pass has already been activated on this device.
deeplinkActivation.activationInvalid: The activation is in an invalid state.
